dict.acceptation: 盖子；限制；[口]果盖；[口]遮盖；

sent.orig: LID is an ecological stormwater management approach that sustains a site's predevelopment hydrologic regime.
sent.trans: LID是一项生态雨水处理系统，以促进恢复该地区的水文管理。

sent.orig: Rename the new extrusions Extrude1 and Extrude2 to Inlet Lid and Outlet Lid correspondingly.
sent.trans: 给新的拉伸改名“入口盖子”和“出口盖子”符合拉伸1和拉伸2。

sent.orig: This box/The lid of this box doesn't close properly, ie The lid doesn't fit.
Lid lock system improves safety by preventing the centrifuge from operating while the lid is open.
sent.trans: 盖子锁定系统可避免离心分离机在开盖状态下工作，从而提高系统的安全性。

sent.orig: Cover the bottom with pebbles. Screw on the lid. Decorate the lid, if you wish.
sent.trans: 在罐底铺满小鹅卵石，凝上盖子。愿意的话，还可以装饰一下瓶子。
